swarmsmps2.commands.charm.effect.success: The charm %1$s has been sent to %2$s
swarmsmps2.commands.charm.effect.too_man: You cannot target more than %1$s player(s) at once
swarmsmps2.commands.charm.effect.too_far: You're too far away from that player.
swarmsmps2.commands.charm.effect.not_mer: You're unable to charm any players.
swarmsmps2.commands.admin.set_tag.succes: You've set the tag of %1$s players
swarmsmps2.commands.admin.remove_tag.suc: You've removed the tag of %1$s players
swarmsmps2.commands.admin.start_duel.err: You may only specify 1 player per argument.
One of the players is already in a duel.
swarmsmps2.commands.admin.start_duel.inf: A duel has been started between you and %1$s!
A duel has been started between %1$s and %2$s!
swarmsmps2.commands.duel.already_request: You've already requested a duel with %1$s.
swarmsmps2.commands.duel.request.cancell: Your duel request with %1$s has been cancelled.
swarmsmps2.commands.duel.request.not_fou: Either that duel does not exist or the duel has expired.
swarmsmps2.commands.duel.target_in_duel: That player is already in a duel. Cancelling request.
swarmsmps2.commands.duel.source_in_duel: You are already in a duel. Cancelling request.
swarmsmps2.commands.duel.request.decline: Your duel request with %1$s has been declined.
swarmsmps2.commands.message.players.too_: You may only send a message to 1 player.
swarmsmps2.commands.message.players.not_: Your message gets lost in the cosmos.
swarmsmps2.commands.head.no_room: You do not have room for that head.
swarmsmps2.commands.admin.head.failure.m: You can only give head to 1 player at a time.
swarmsmps2.commands.backstory.error: There was an error retrieving your backstory.
swarmsmps2.duel.server.finish: The duel between %1$s and %2$s has ended. The winner is %1$s.
swarmsmps2.dueling.died: You've died in the duel. You've lost the duel.
swarmsmps2.dueling.died.non-player: You've died due to a non-player during the duel. You've lost the duel.
swarmsmps2.dueling.attack.cancelled: You're unable to attack non-dueling players while in a duel.
swarmsmps2.command.whisper.disabled: This command is disabled. Please use the /message command instead.
